website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, easy-to-use life jacket with manual inflation that is best suited for light recreational activities.
pros: Comes with both waist and crotch straps to fully secure the vest, both vertically and horizontally, to the swimmer
cons: This would not be the life jacket you'd want to depend on in the deep ocean, but for more casual uses, it's just right

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for me and my girlfriend for our trip to Thailand. There’s plenty of snorkeling to do there but she can’t swim. This product did the job and enabled her to enjoy the fish and coral for hours. I liked it too because it allowed me to be lazy and just relax in the water a bit easier. I liked how you could adjust the amount of air in it easily on the fly. It packed down small in our luggage. The colors were nice and vibrant. I got yellow and pink for her. It’s easy to put on. And comes with a little storage sack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These make snorkeling safer and easier for everybody.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a snorkeling trip in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. They deflate and fit just fine in our travel luggage. They're great--it takes the 'swimming' aspect away from snorkeling. Just lay on your stomach and watch fish. Without it, it felt unsettling to be in 10-20 ft deep water, because you're always treading water and fighting waves. With it, i felt like I could take a break any time to fix my goggles, or whatever. With it on I felt safe and could stay out for well over an hour. It turned snorkeling from swimming in the surf to loafing around watching fish. Get this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: repharaoh

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple for us to use on a cruise as you can't snorkel on the ship's private island without a safety vest. We had masks and flippers, too, as we could drive to the cruise port and didn't have to worry about weight limits. We saved enough to pay for the vests, which seem to be of good quality, were easy to figure out and inflate, and were bright colors so we could find each other. I'm sure I'll be using them many more times to peek in on Sponge Bob and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband not a great swimmer - loved this it gave him the confidence to snorkel for hours
customer_reviews.author: lesley over the pond

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkeling Vest
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this snorkeling vest. It was very easy to inflate and deflate, didn’t take up much space in my luggage, and made snorkeling so much easier. While other snorkelers without a vest struggled in choppy water, my husband and I were able to relax and enjoy the underwater scenery for longer because we didn’t tire out. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Makes my husband feel secure when snorkeling. Works good easy to use. Gives a nice measure of protection without impeeding movement.
customer_reviews.author: Skbaby

customer_reviews.title: Fit well so easy to adjust. Seems to fit very large people too.
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, packaged well. Light fitting. So easy to inflate. Hope's it works as well as it fits. I'll know best when I'm on my vacation. Wanted something to help build my confidence for my 1st snorkeling adventure in a very long time. Once was too much for me, retrying it again. With the equipment I bought I'm looking for a more enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: tequila e. langham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snorkeling vest
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I consider myself a pretty good swimmer. But out in the open ocean or reef with incoming swells and waves, it's easy to tire out. I believe this product is not designed to be used as a life saving device. But, it performs really well - for what is designed for out in the ocean. It will help you float horizontally, and it also helps you expel less energy while you are snorkeling. Super easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to keep me afloat and calm my claustrophobia fears while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Bev C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Nicer than using a "resort vest" that may be smelly dirty and has been in lots of mouths... You don't need much air in the vest for snorkeling. Works great and fold small for packing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Tested in my pool. Works fine for me. Im 5'6" and 190 lbs. It inflates fine and holds the air.
customer_reviews.author: partyoffive

customer_reviews.title: Quick to inflate and deflate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and adjust. Kept body at good level. Do not expect to use as life vest comfortable and easily fit adulr..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I got a ticket for No Lifejacket while wearing this.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a federally approved life jacket, who knew there was such a thing? So if you are boating/kayaking on a public body of water, then you could be breaking the law. Now I have a mandatory court appearance. Great! The officer said "this is a toy, not a life jacket." Just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good precaution and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good precaution and worth the price. It is not super heavy duty so while it is a steal for those snorkeling within swimming distance of land, I wouldn't feel comfortable relying on it if I was a couple miles off shore like you can be in the Florida Keys, where you might be swept way away from land.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep dad

customer_reviews.title: Lyuwpes Snorkel Vest is Great
customer_reviews.text: The Lyuwpes Inflatable Snorkel Vest works beautifully for the buoyancy needed to feel confident while snorkeling. Its outer covering is polyester which is soft against the skin, unlike canvas, and is the turquoise color pictured, My husband and I purchased the same color to find each other in crowds. Easy to inflate and adjustable straps keep the vest from bunching up around the neck if adjusted properly. They are well made, pack easily, and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not good for snorkeling - get a jacket style.
customer_reviews.text: This vest moved all around unless the crotch strap was so tight that it hurt. It is most useful if you are vertical, but if you go horizontal to snorkel, it just gets in the way. I ended up wearing it deflated, keeping it as a safety device for an emergency. My wife opted for a jacket style snorkel vest, which worked great. I recommend spending a little more and getting the jacket style.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Take my own gear
customer_reviews.text: Tired of poor equipment when taking a snorkeling excursion when on a cruise; so decided to take my own gear. Price is good, packs flat, and provides that little it of security you need when snorkeling. Note; this was a replacement order, first try from Amazon I got some kind of toy in the box and had to "re-order" and "return" the improperly shipped item. Order Early so you have time to sort out the screw-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO Great!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously we bought these for a trip to Hawaii. We were going to be on the island for a week and planned on snorkeling just about every day. When these vests weren't choking you they were forcing your head above water. Save your money, buy a pool noodle once you get to the island or throw a $3 inflatable mat in your suitcase, then pass it on when your leave.. That's what we ended up doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cruise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cruise snorkel excursion. I haven't went yet I can tell u this. It folds up for packing, aired up easy, the side tube let's out air easily enough on land. Idk about in water.... The only thing I see difficult is the way it straps thru the leg area. I have since seen vests that do not use the so called tie durden strap but they are way more expensive... I'll revise once I get back from cruise
customer_reviews.author: Lesli Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Rides up the neck!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unless I’ve done something wrong, this vest kept riding up the front of my neck, so I had to keep pulling it down while I snorkeled. I’ve tried adjusting the air volume but that did not help. Hated it!!! Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: CbIHO4EK

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy for piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginner snorkeling! I took the family to Hawaii and we used these for the kids... okay, one was for me😂. Well they worked like a champ and i didn’t have to worry about drowning kids or myself. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: these work great.
customer_reviews.text: These vests work great. I have used them 5/6 times now. I have 2 strong swimmers and 1 not strong swimmer and for everyone they are fantastic. They compress into a ball for easy packing, and can save a ton of money on having to not rent life vests.
customer_reviews.author: teeed

customer_reviews.title: Survive dry test
customer_reviews.text: Blows up easy and kept the air inside with no deflation for 24 hours. Takes a little effort to get it adjusted just right. Didn't get to try it in water.
customer_reviews.author: Omle57FNH

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling Vest
customer_reviews.text: So long as you adjust the straps properly, this works as intended. Wish it was a true pdf because I love that there is no interference with your back, but it's not...so it's not a legal pdf in Florida for kayaking/boating. Having said that, it wasn't advertised as such, so I can't complain...it works okay for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jwranch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little device
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. This was perfect for snorkel trip. It packs flat and easy and blows up quick. Used it snorkeling and didn't have to worry about treading water. I just floated around able to see all the fish at my leisure. It was awesome to have and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and it works
customer_reviews.text: Made of thicker material and is super easy to self inflate with the inflating tube. Once you have the best on then blow it up until it gets tight and keeps you above water. The straps are easy to clasp into place.
customer_reviews.author: A Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Will be good for traveling, but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've used horse collar style snorkel vests before. None of them I used are particularly comfortable. All of them I've used ride up around your neck awkwardly. This one is no exception. It is easy to inflate and deflate. It will be easy to travel with. It came with a small mesh pouch.
customer_reviews.author: FBinFL

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase: the life vest was very lite, took almost no space and very easy to use. I used it for snorkeling. One thing to mention: the straps need to be pretty tight and cannot be too loose, otherwise the west is moving slightly either on the left or on the right and I was floating not really on my stomach but on either side. After I tighten the straps it was much better experience.
customer_reviews.author: irina mcd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great product for traveling. Easy use and inflation. Good floatation. However, the vest is uncomfortable as it tends to push to the neck and head even when the between legs straps are tightened. Makes it uncomfortable to swim.
customer_reviews.author: K09

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to snorkel around on vacation and tried it out at home. It’s easy to use and gives you pieces of mind know you have some floatation when you need it
customer_reviews.author: JULIE

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These worked sooo great! Perfect for travel, loved how they took minimal space in my suitcase. My only complaint was they moved around on my slender 8 year old enough we got tired of readjustments. Since he snorkeled hours and hours per day I felt like they fit their purpose pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: KariM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and pack away.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for floating around in the pool with my kids. I'm not a good swimmer and I'm a plus size woman. This was a great alternative to a full size life vest like my kids have for swimming and playing in the pool with. I had no fit issues and it's super easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: NOT USCG APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: The product does not have buoyancy data, so it likely won't float larger people. The spring on the mouth inflation valve is very tight and would prove quite difficult to inflate in an emergency situation. Also when folded, this does not compact as small as indicated by the picture. Basically direct from China crap.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schiffer

customer_reviews.title: My sons birthday:
customer_reviews.text: Well, my son still has to wait(until this summer) to use this but I am absolutely SURE it will be perfect! We live in a VERY cold area. Like, dry suits required spot and I am SO happy to have given this to my son(when he turned 17)! Can't wait-but I will anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Atilla Mitrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great quality. Took on a cruise and snorkeled without renting equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product in great colors
customer_reviews.text: We had a group of six for our snorkeling adventures in the Bahamas during February this year. We all had our own color and were easily recognizable from the boat and in the water. Helps keep us safe with buddy system. Can inflate as little or as much as desired. Very comfortable, even with strap under crotch.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: My review of the Lyuwpes Snorkel Vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for me and my wife with plans to visit Bermuda. It packed very easily . Boy ,did it really help me out as I am in my golden years and I have copd. I love to snorkel in Bermuda and was able to do it with ease with this vest and was able to stay out longer and see much more then I was able to do in years past. Got to see some amazing fish and coral. I would recommend this vest for added security and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: john gawlik

customer_reviews.title: Not bad keeps you afloat
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Quick inflate and works well for traveling. The cord that goes between your legs can be a bit uncomfortable however. It does keep you afloat with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I tightened up the straps it was always up in my throat. even when swimming horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Bob077

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say that I have actually used it yet but I did inflate it and it hold air well and fits just fine. I am 5'8" and weigh 120 pounds. I am sure this could fit larger people as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tucci

customer_reviews.title: P
customer_reviews.text: I lived the ease of use, I felt more Boy it while I was snorkeling, only the strap that goes between your client is a little uncomfortable at times
customer_reviews.author: Cover check aft uph

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used them at the Dry Tortugas and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go snorkeling in Hawaii and American Samoa in December. I am pretty disappointed with the product. It is extremely hard to adjust the straps and it continues to pull up and makes it hard to snorkel around. It ended up being more of a hassle than anything. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cselle

customer_reviews.title: Good snorkeling vest!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Easy to inflate and deflate. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Boukezzoula

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this at the cruise ports. I felt very safe. Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: mrc

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to inflate & easy to re-pack & bring home. Great purchase, as I love to snorkel but like a little floating help.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Worth buy
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, easy to pack and carry. Although it thought it's for adults but it's kind of for people between age 10-20 years old and small body. Although this live jacket can save any one from drowning. My wife used it to sit on beach as she is scared of ocean and sea.
customer_reviews.author: Vem

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: Used in Western Caribbean and same style the boats use. Works well and depending on how much air you put in it by plastic tubing (blow up) adjustable amount of buoyancy. Loved the blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she used it on our last cruise. It inflated well and worked the way it was supposed to. She really liked the way it folded up.
customer_reviews.author: LesToczek

customer_reviews.title: great snorkel vest
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack. Easy to use. Love the bright colors so you are easily identified while in the water. Be sure to adjust the straps to the correct position or it will ride up too much. Once you find the right spot it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: nittany

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel Vest
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for snorkeling...easy to inflate and deflate..traveled nice and flat.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Used this in the Caribbean. Very easy to pack as it took very little space. Easy to clean. Did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I float. I dive. I swim.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It fits me (I'm not small) comfortably and allows me to control how much air I want in it while snorkelling and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Nils T. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for snorkeling and gave me the confidence to go in deep water even though I’m a non swimmer. Quality construction and easy to inflate
customer_reviews.author: John E. Devore

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very weak swimmer and this vest kept my head above water at the lake. I am about 150 lbs and this vest made me feel safe and allowed me to float around and enjoy myself. The straps are a bit confusing but everything else about this vest is simple and works.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. 31 yrs old

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel
customer_reviews.text: We brought our own snorkel gear on vacation and these vests came in handy. They are easy to inflate and deflate. Compact to travel in our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly, good value
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it was supposed to for a good price...so good I did not feel bad leaving it with my hosts and returning with lighter luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak after only a couple of Days!
customer_reviews.text: This vest leaked after only a couple of DAYS of being used correctly.
customer_reviews.author: FlaFamOf4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: Snorkel vest inflates with ease and deflates just as quickly! Comes with it's netted storage bag! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MsHappy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for snorkeling in St. Lucia. They packed into the luggage with ease. Inflation & deflation was easy. I weigh 140 and husband weighs 200 and they floated us with no problems. Would purchase again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: kay dukes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inflatable vest
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Easy to pack. Worked as advertised. Kept in storage for our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Snorkling
customer_reviews.text: I used it for snorkeling in the Keys. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA P.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, blows up fast.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for backpack float tube fishing. It's light and blows up in seconds. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hohs

customer_reviews.title: Took these snorkeling in the Caribbean and they worked great and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Took these snorkeling in the Caribbean and they worked great and as expected. Cost was good, they pack small and are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S. Cindrich

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.  Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack and adjust sizes. I'm petite so it still felt a bit big and straps really ride up when in the water
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, and easy to pack for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Easy to pack for travel. Easy to use and seems to have durable material.
customer_reviews.author: AntMan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this snorkel vest as i am very scared in the water.using it for snorkeling and i don't have to worry when swimming in a deeper water.it hold me on the water but i can snorkel away.gives me great confidence and really protective.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas ka

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well..color makes it/me easy to find. Allows you to relax and enjoy the fishies!
customer_reviews.author: CTT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vest for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Great best. The vest folds down very small so it is easy to pack for travel. Vest makes snorkeling easy. Easy to blow up( it only takes a few blows). Easy to make adjustments in the water while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this 1 as an extra so im assuming it works as well as the others lol
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Z

customer_reviews.title: Lost ability to stay inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these for my charter business and after 3 months they have lost their ability to keep inflated.
customer_reviews.author: sloww

customer_reviews.title: Dec
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kayak, easy on easy off, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vicki R. Zak

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great vest overall for the price! We bought a set for snorkeling in Maui which made it easy to float for hours which checking out the fish and coral. Not the most stylish but very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Trebels

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: If you want a light weight buoyancy aid that looks good this is the one to go for .it is very convenient to inflate and deflate.it is also east to carry and receive.
customer_reviews.author: mucky

customer_reviews.title: Its not a life preserve but it definitely keeps one a float... at least I was and I weight 125pds.
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to use even in a pool when you just want to relax in the water.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary  crespo- storelee

customer_reviews.title: Good Vest for Snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Taken on trips to Hawaii and the Caribbean. IWorks great for snorkeling. Inflates and does what you would expect from a vest, so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest is really good quality. I tested it in my pool and can’t wait to use it in the ocean when I snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: guess who

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I felt safe and I was happy to be able to snorkel in Puerto Rico. Easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkel vest. Easy inflates and to throw in suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb 2019

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The vest was easy to inflate and stayed inflated until I let the air out.
customer_reviews.author: Very Satisfied!!!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase for a lake trip a few weeks ago, arrived just in time. The quality is great and easy to be brought around. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from Hawaii and used it a lot when snorkeling! I worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, really helps me a lot enjoying my snorkeling trip
customer_reviews.author: Inday cel

customer_reviews.title: I'm a weak swimmer definitely not for met.
customer_reviews.text: Straps were very uncomfortable particularly the back strap...I tested it in the swimming pool and it gave me tension headache.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Felt totally safe and visible in the ocean snorkeling. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cooltown

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the same snorkel vest recommended by the NPS for snorkeling in protected areas. Packs down small. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Great for snorkeling. My husband is not the best swimmer gives him confidence when snorkeling. Easy and lightweight to pack in our carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: Adds that little bit of feeling of security you might need
customer_reviews.text: Great little vest. Rolls up compactly into a net sleeve. Easy to use, inflate as much or as little as you like even on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be well made and easy to use. The price was reasonable...
customer_reviews.author: Martin P. Messa

customer_reviews.title: Not for ladies?
customer_reviews.text: My father has this same vest, his fits great and does not shift when he is in the water. Mine- not the same. I think the physical gender difference is the reason. Mine shifts up when I'm in the water, I was constantly adjusting it and was so frustrated by the end of the day I don't plan to use it again. I'll find another option. I just don't think this is designed to accommodate ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Crotch strap rides up. Very uncomfortable for the girls and unbearable for the boys. Tried these on adults and kids. Everyone complained.
customer_reviews.author: DSH

product_meta.title: Lyuwpes Inflatable Snorkel Vest Adult Snorkeling Jackets Vests Free Diving Swimming Safety Load Up to 220 Ibs
feature_bullets: Lyuwpes Snorkeling Vest: small footprint, large buoyancy (from 80 to 220 lbs) while snorkeling; fluorescence colors provide excellent visibility, great for learners and good swimmers
Fast Inflation, Fast Deflation: snorkel vest supports the body, just right fully inflated without the need of excess air, convenient mouthpiece location
Horse Collar Style Over The Neck: simple to put on and take off, very comfortable without skin abrasions, fitting well for most adults
Adjustable Waist & Crotch Straps: latch straps vertically and horizontally, providing a secure and worry free, easy pinch buckles for fast removal
Flexible, Lightweight & Compact: easy to pack, a little smart companion for journey (bonus mesh bag included)
